info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy, northeastern Hidalgo and northwestern Willacy Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Yturria to near Hargill Elementary. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Elsa, Hargill, Lasara, San Manuel, Linn, Faysville, Red Gate, Jose Borrego Middle School and La Blanca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
